items.title: hololive production Collaboration with Manhattan Portage
items.author: Horii
items.content:
COVER Corporation announced a collaboration with the iconic New York bag brand, Manhattan Portage. This collaboration will feature hololive English talents from hololive English -Advent- and hololive English -Justice-, in a special collection that merges the unique styles of these VTubers with Manhattan Portage’s urban aesthetic. Manhattan Portage, celebrated for its “New York Tough” ethos and high-quality bags designed for the dynamic urban environment, has been a signature brand all across the globe. This partnership aims to bring together the vibrant energy of hololive English -Advent- and hololive English -Justice- with Manhattan Portage’s commitment to creating practical, stylish, and enduring products!

The collaboration will feature a range of bags, starting from Manhattan Portage’s signature messenger bag to waist bags, backpacks, and mini shoulder bags, designed with special themes inspired by hololive English -Advent- and hololive English -Justice-, incorporating their distinctive colors and logo designs.

hololive production Collaboration with Manhattan Portage

Pre-Order Period: May 8th, 2025 11:00AM – June 8th, 2025 (EST)

Born in New York City in 1983, Manhattan Portage designs durable and functional bags for urban living. The brand’s iconic messenger bags and other products are known for their quality craftsmanship and timeless style, embodying the “New York Tough” spirit.

items.title: OMOCAT x hololive English -Myth- New Plushie Collection
items.author: Horii
items.content:
COVER Corporation has announced that the pre-order of OMOCAT x hololive English -Myth- plushie collection started on April 30th at 5:00 PM (PST).

OMOCAT x hololive English -Myth- plushie collection, a collaboration project between hololive English -Myth- and OMOCAT, an apparel brand known for its popularity in the U.S. and worldwide, released its new collection, featuring the talents of hololive English -Myth-. This collection includes 6.5″ tall plushies made with 100% polyester/100% PP cotton.

Pre-order is available on the OMOCAT website. Please check it out!

OMOCAT x hololive English -Myth- plushie collection Line-up: Takanashi Kiara plush Gawr Gura plush

* Will be Shipped from the United States, and the expected arrival for the items will be around October 2025. For more information on shipping, please visit the OMOCAT official website.

OMOCAT is a L.A.-based indie apparel and merchandise brand that eclectically blends together illustration, anime subculture, and street fashion. Established in 2013, OMOCAT’s original take on graphic apparel has garnered the attention of art enthusiasts and the pop culture community through the years.

items.title: hololive production to Hold 2nd World Tour Concert “hololive STAGE World Tour’25 -Synchronize!-”!
items.author: Horii
items.content:
April 23, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced that hololive production will be kicking off their second world tour concert event, “hololive STAGE World Tour’25 -Synchronize!-” kicking off in July, featuring an international lineup of main performers and rotating special guests.

From August 2024, COVER Corporation held its first world tour, “hololive STAGE World Tour’24 -Soar!-”. This year, to further connect with fans across the globe, the world tour will feature several new locations across multiple continents.

The hololive STAGE concerts in Sydney, Hong Kong, Vancouver, New York, and Kuala Lumpur will feature Momosuzu Nene of hololive, Kureiji Ollie of hololive Indonesia, and Mori Calliope, IRyS, and Nerissa Ravencroft of hololive English, as the main performers. Different from last year, every city will have two unique special guests.More information about special guests will be announced later in our official website. Ouro Kronii and Hakos Baelz from hololive English will be the special guests for Sydney show, while Tokino Sora and Sakura Miko from hololive Generation 0, will be the special guests for Hong Kong. Transcending group boundaries, these members will unite to deliver performances that aim to be enjoyed by international fans.

For the latest information about the hololive STAGE World Tour ‘25 tickets, special guest line-up, venue, merchandise, and more, please check the official concert website and outline below.

hololive STAGE World Tour’25 -Synchronize!-

Ticket information for each location will be announced and handled by their respective event organizer.

　Date: July 12-13, 2025 (Concert date: July 12, 2025 in local time)

　Venue: ICC Sydney, Darling Harbour Theatre

　Address: 14 Darling Drive, Sydneyhttps://smash.org.au/holo2025 　Special Guests: Ouro Kronii / Hakos Baelz

　Concert date: July 27, 2025 in local time

　Venue: Hopewell Hotel Grand Ballroom

　Address: 15 Kennedy Road, Wan Chai, Hong Kong

　Event Link: To be announced later

　Special Guests: Tokino Sora / Sakura Miko

　More to be announced on a later date.

■Anime Revolution (Vancouver) 　Date: August 1-3, 2025 (Concert date: August 3, 2025 in local time)

　Venue: Vancouver Convention Centre

　Address: 1055 Canada Pl, Vancouver, BC V6C 0C3https://summer.animerevolution.ca

■Anime NYC (New York City) 　Date: August 21-24, 2025 (Concert date: August 22, 2025 in local time)

　Venue: JAVITS CONVENTION CENTER

　Address: 429 11th Ave, New York, NY 10001https://animenyc.com

　Date: December 20, 2025 in local time

　More to be announced on a later date.

*Additional concerts will be announced at a later date. Stay tuned to the official website and social media for more concert announcements.

Momosuzu Nene / Kureiji Ollie / Mori Calliope / IRyS / Nerissa Ravencroft

Guest details other than Sydney and Hong Kong will be announced later.

More to be announced later.

items.title: ANIPLUS x hololive production Collaboration Cafe Opens in Korea From May 1st, 2025
items.author: Horii
items.content:
COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced that hololive production x ANIPLUS collaboration cafe will be opened in Korea for a limited period starting from May 1st, 2025.

The collaboration café theme was previously held in the ANIPLUS café in Singapore and will be revived in the ANIPLUS café in Korea. The collaboration cafe will feature a collaboration menu featuring Shirakami Fubuki, Ookami Mio, Nekomata Okayu, and Inugami Korone from hololive’s unit “hololive GAMERS” and the members of hololive 3rd generation, Usada Pekora, Shiranui Flare, Shirogane Noel, and Houshou Marine. Attendees who order the collaboration menu will receive exclusive items.

In addition, hololive production x ANIPLUS collaboration café collaboration merch will be released.

ANIPLUS x hololive production Café

May 1st – June 29th

B101, Mapo Hangang PRUGIO 2nd apt. Arcade, 14 World Cup-ro 3-gil, Mapo-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea

May 1st – June 29th

9F, 672, Jungang-daero, Busanjin-gu, Busan, Republic of Korea

May 1st – May 28th

401~403, Cheongjeong-Building, 126, Jungang-ro, Jung-gu, Daejeon, Republic of Korea

May 1st – June 29th

12, Chungjangnoan-gil, Dong-gu, Gwangju, Republic of Korea

ANIPLUS x hololive production Café Menu

Limited Bonus for the 1st to 4th Week: Coaster & Mini holder (Random) *Limited bonus for the 5th week and onwards will be announced at a later date.

ANIPLUS x hololive production Café Merch

hololive production x ANIPLUS Café Merch Bonus With 20,000 KRW spent on hololive production merchandise: Sticker (random)

With 50,000 KRW spent on hololive production merchandise: Hologram Ticket (random)

With 70,000 KRW spent on hololive production merchandise: Transparent fan (random)

*Designs distributed randomly. *All premiums are available while stocks last only.
